title: 50 FREE FONT PACKAGE GIVEAWAY
content:
Sansational is a brand new release from Type Innovations.

If you are one of the first 50 people to login:

[https://www.fontspring.com/fonts/type-innovations/sansational](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414184818/https:/www.fontspring.com/fonts/type-innovations/sansational "https://www.fontspring.com/fonts/type-innovations/sansational")

click on the "heart" symbol, top upper right hand side... to favorite us, or like us...

and send us an email to tell us why you like this font...

mail to: [akaczun@verizon.net](mailto:akaczun@verizon.net)

we will send you the entire new font family release (6-font) package absolutely free.

But, be quick... only 50 complete font family packages will be given away.

And, if you have a moment... check out all of our other great font offerings.

[https://www.fontspring.com/foundry/type-innovations](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414184818/https:/www.fontspring.com/foundry/type-innovations "https://www.fontspring.com/foundry/type-innovations")

Thank you and we hope you like our fonts.

TYPE INNOVATIONS

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Sansational\_poster\_1.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414184818/http:/typophile.com/files/Sansational_poster_1.png) | 96.9 KB |
author: akaczun

comments.content: Is this related to the existing Sansation font? Seems a bit too close for comfort otherwise.

Sansational has just made it to Myfonts "Hot New Fonts" list.

Check it out—  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/typeinnovations/sansational/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414184818/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/typeinnovations/sansational/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/typeinnovations/sansational/")

Hurry—time is running out, only about a dozen Free 6-font family "Sansational" packages left to give away, as part of this offer.

Do the few steps required above and get a Free package.

Going... going...

Hi Alex,  
be aware that another font of the same name already exist  
 [http://marketplace.veer.com/font/Sansational-JBT0001079?skeywords=all%20...](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414184818/http:/marketplace.veer.com/font/Sansational-JBT0001079?skeywords=all%20fonts&stermids=100003269# "http://marketplace.veer.com/font/Sansational-JBT0001079?skeywords=all%20fonts&stermids=100003269#")
